results.name: default/wordpress-57494c479b-dbgqp

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.1.4:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the request to the specified URL timed out.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Increase the timeout in the readiness probe settings.
3. Ensure the application is running and accessible at the specified URL.

results.name: default/mysql

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-57494c479b-dbgqp], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready, though one is expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-57494c479b-dbgqp`.
3. Describe pod for events: `kubectl describe pod wordpress-57494c479b-dbgqp`.
4. Resolve any issues found.
